sql:
CREATE TABLE "conversation_messages" (
	"id" uuid PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	"conversation_id" uuid NOT NULL,
	"position" integer NOT NULL,
	"role" text NOT NULL,
	"content" text NOT NULL,
	"temperature_at_creation" real NOT NULL,
	"top_k_at_creation" real NOT NULL,
	"user_id" text NOT NULL,
	"soft_deleted" boolean DEFAULT false NOT NULL,
	"created_at" timestamp with time zone DEFAULT (now() AT TIME ZONE 'utc'::text) NOT NULL,
	"updated_at" timestamp with time zone DEFAULT (now() AT TIME ZONE 'utc'::text) NOT NULL,
	"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone
);

CREATE TABLE "conversations" (
	"id" uuid PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	"name" text NOT NULL,
	"conversation_summary" text,
	"system_prompt" text DEFAULT '',
	"top_k" real NOT NULL,
	"temperature" real NOT NULL,
	"user_id" text NOT NULL,
	"soft_deleted" boolean DEFAULT false NOT NULL,
	"created_at" timestamp with time zone DEFAULT (now() AT TIME ZONE 'utc'::text) NOT NULL,
	"updated_at" timestamp with time zone DEFAULT (now() AT TIME ZONE 'utc'::text) NOT NULL,
	"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone
);

CREATE TABLE "organization_memberships" (
	"id" uuid PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid() NOT NULL,
	"user_id" text NOT NULL,
	"organization_id" text NOT NULL,
	"role" text NOT NULL,
	"created_at" timestamp with time zone DEFAULT (now() AT TIME ZONE 'utc'::text) NOT NULL,
	"updated_at" timestamp with time zone DEFAULT (now() AT TIME ZONE 'utc'::text) NOT NULL,
	"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone
);

CREATE TABLE "organizations" (
	"id" text PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	"name" text NOT NULL,
	"slug" text NOT NULL,
	"created_by_id" text,
	"created_at" timestamp with time zone DEFAULT (now() AT TIME ZONE 'utc'::text) NOT NULL,
	"updated_at" timestamp with time zone DEFAULT (now() AT TIME ZONE 'utc'::text) NOT NULL,
	"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone
);

CREATE TABLE "users" (
	"id" text PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	"first_name" text,
	"last_name" text,
	"email" text,
	"username" text,
	"last_sign_in_at" timestamp,
	"created_at" timestamp with time zone DEFAULT (now() AT TIME ZONE 'utc'::text) NOT NULL,
	"updated_at" timestamp with time zone DEFAULT (now() AT TIME ZONE 'utc'::text) NOT NULL,
	"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone
);

ALTER TABLE "conversation_messages" ADD CONSTRAINT "conversation_messages_conversation_id_conversations_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("conversation_id") REFERENCES "public"."conversations"("id") ON DELETE cascade ON UPDATE no action;
ALTER TABLE "conversation_messages" ADD CONSTRAINT "conversation_messages_user_id_users_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("user_id") REFERENCES "public"."users"("id") ON DELETE no action ON UPDATE no action;
ALTER TABLE "conversations" ADD CONSTRAINT "conversations_user_id_users_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("user_id") REFERENCES "public"."users"("id") ON DELETE cascade ON UPDATE no action;
ALTER TABLE "organization_memberships" ADD CONSTRAINT "organization_memberships_user_id_users_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("user_id") REFERENCES "public"."users"("id") ON DELETE no action ON UPDATE no action;

ALTER TABLE "organization_memberships" ADD CONSTRAINT "organization_memberships_organization_id_organizations_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("organization_id") REFERENCES "public"."organizations"("id") ON DELETE no action ON UPDATE no action;
ALTER TABLE "organizations" ADD CONSTRAINT "organizations_created_by_id_users_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("created_by_id") REFERENCES "public"."users"("id") ON DELETE no action ON UPDATE no action;
CREATE INDEX "idx_messages_conversation" ON "conversation_messages" USING btree ("conversation_id");
CREATE INDEX "idx_messages_position" ON "conversation_messages" USING btree ("position");
CREATE INDEX "idx_messages_conv_position" ON "conversation_messages" USING btree ("conversation_id","position");
CREATE INDEX "idx_messages_created" ON "conversation_messages" USING btree ("created_at");
CREATE INDEX "idx_messages_soft_deleted" ON "conversation_messages" USING btree ("soft_deleted");
CREATE INDEX "idx_conversations_updated" ON "conversations" USING btree ("updated_at");
CREATE INDEX "idx_conversations_deleted" ON "conversations" USING btree ("deleted_at");
CREATE INDEX "idx_conversations_user" ON "conversations" USING btree ("user_id");
CREATE INDEX "idx_conversations_soft_deleted" ON "conversations" USING btree ("soft_deleted");
CREATE INDEX "unique_membership" ON "organization_memberships" USING btree ("user_id","organization_id");
